entry.title: Portugal Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 15, 00:00 - 03:00 PST Nov 11, 07:26 PST Scheduled - Our Voice carrier partner is conducting a maintenance from 15 November 2022 at 00:00 PST until 15 November 2022 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call drops to a subset of Twilio Portugal phone numbers.

entry.title: Mexico SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 14, 22:00 PST - Nov 15, 04:00 PST Nov 10, 06:44 PST Scheduled - The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 November 2022 at 22:00 PDT until 15 November 2022 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

entry.title: Degraded service in Rippling
entry.summary: Nov 15, 00:01 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 14, 22:59 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Nov 14, 22:56 UTC Identified - We've identified the issue and deploying a fix. Users may be having issues using various features and services inside of the Rippling app.

entry.title: Incident: Some users are unable to post messages
entry.summary: Thank you for your patience. We identified the culprit and reverted a recent change that caused this behavior. Affected users should now be able to post messages. Please reload Slack using Command + Shift + R (Mac) or Ctrl + Shift + R (Windows/Linux), and let us know if you need additional help.

entry.title: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Beeline
entry.summary: Nov 14, 14:00 PST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 14, 13:01 PST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Nov 9, 22:35 PST Scheduled - The Beeline network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 14 November 2022 at 13:00 PDT until 14 November 2022 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

entry.title: SMS Delivery Delays to Algar Telecom Brazil
entry.summary: Nov 14, 13:43 PST Update - We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 11:45 PST Update - We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue. We will provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 10:54 PST Update - We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Algar Telecom Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 10:42 PST Investigating - Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delays to Algar Telecom Brazil . Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

entry.title: Errors When Setting up TOTP in the Twilio Console
entry.summary: Nov 14, 12:43 PST Resolved - TOTP in the Console is operating normally at this time. Nov 14, 12:41 PST Update - TOTP in the Console continues to operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 12:09 PST Monitoring - TOTP in the Console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 11:32 PST Update - We are experiencing issues with TOTP setup in the Twilio Console. Users are reporting the following error message: “Oops something went wrong on our server. Please try again later.” We are working to restore functionality as soon as possible. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available. Nov 14, 11:21 PST Investigating - Our monitoring system has detected a potential issue with TOTP in the Console. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

entry.title: Scheduled infrastructure maintenance
entry.summary: Nov 4, 06:05 CET Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 4, 05:00 CET In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Nov 2, 12:39 CET Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Friday 4th of November, between 5 AM and 7 AM CET, when you can expect a few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services will be affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to the platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.summary: Nov 4, 04:01 UTC Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Nov 4, 03:00 UTC In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 27, 17:00 UTC Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

entry.title: Incident: Users having trouble creating a workflow in Workflow Builder
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On Wednesday, November 2nd at 2:12 PM PST to 4:34 PM PST, some users were running into issues with publishing a workflow when using Workflow Builder. Clicking the “Next” button would not return any response, and would cause a workflow to remain in its unpublished state. A new code change had been deployed that caused us to exit early in workflow creation and this is now fixed.

entry.title: Incident with Issues and Pull Requests
entry.summary: Nov 1, 21:25 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Nov 1, 20:25 UTC Update - We continue to investigate the cause of incorrect results on issue and pull requests search pages. Nov 1, 19:48 UTC Update - We are investigating reports of incorrect results on issue and pull requests search pages. Nov 1, 19:46 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Issues and Pull Requests.

entry.title: Incident: For an emoji sent as a standalone message, the emoji code is not displayed on hover
entry.summary:
Issue Summary:
On Wednesday, October 26th at 2:15 PM PST Friday to October 28th 9:12 PM PST, some users were unable to view emoji/code previews when hovering their cursor over messages containing emojis. Upon investigation, we discovered that an error had occurred with the jumbomoji (a message with just an emoji) previewer during the process of a backend code-change we were performing related to emoji. Once we learned this, we were able to deploy a fix which rectified this issue for all affected users.

entry.title: Incident: Some users may be experiencing issues sending messages, loading threads, and saving bookmarks
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 28, 2022 from about 1:06 PM PDT to 1:17 PM PDT, some customers experienced trouble loading threads, sending messages, and saving bookmarks.
This issue occurred when we deployed a web app change resulting in an increased database load. We have since rolled back the deploy, restoring functionality for all affected users.

entry.title: Requests to create room amenity photos failing (Listing Photos POST Request)
entry.summary: Oct 21, 16:03 PDT Resolved - We have identified an issue with creating room amenity photos. The issue would cause POST requests to fail with either a 404 error or a 500 error. This issue approximately started from last Friday, October 14th, 2022. The photo creations are successful in most cases but the requests fail at a later stage resulting in error responses. We have fixed this issue at 3:30pm PT today, but there can be duplicate photos created for room amenities during this time. We advise you to review room amenity photos and use the DELETE endpoint to remove duplicate photos. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

entry.title: Rippling Devices application is not loading some pages

Oct 21, 19:44 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Oct 21, 15:32 UTC Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix has been deployed, we anticipate that pages will be restored soon.

entry.title: High latency performing certain operations
entry.summary: Oct 21, 11:31 PDT Resolved - We have resolved the issue. All import, export and duplication work as expected. Oct 21, 09:39 PDT Identified - We have implemented a partial fix to unblock key functions, and users should see significant improvement in import, export, and duplication times. We continue to work toward full resolution. Oct 21, 08:21 PDT Investigating - Some customers may be experiencing high latency when attempting to export or import content, or duplicate blocks or pages. We are investigating.

entry.title: Incident with API Requests
entry.summary: Oct 19, 20:23 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 19, 19:52 UTC Update - Issues related to out-of-date notifications have been resolved. Oct 19, 19:35 UTC Update - A small percentage of requests to the audit log APIs are failing. We are continuing to apply additional mitigations. Oct 19, 19:28 UTC Update - We are resolving an issue related to out-of-date notifications on GitHub.com. We will provide further updates as we continue resolving the issue. Oct 19, 18:50 UTC Update - We are investigating an issue with failing audit log API requests. We are actively working on mitigations. Oct 19, 17:45 UTC Update - We are investigating an issue related to the audit logs API Oct 19, 17:39 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for API Requests.

entry.title: Incident: Some users are having issues searching in Slack, seeing the "Something went wrong" message.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 19, 2022, from 8:17 AM to 10:13 PM PDT, some users saw a "Something went wrong" error when attempting a search query.
This issue was caused by a recent code change that resulted in searches failing.
We reverted this change, which fixed the issue for all users after a reload of Slack.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Oct 18, 16:16 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 18, 16:05 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted ubuntu-22, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted. We are actively working on mitigations. Oct 18, 15:53 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
